2957836571784811148.NAME: So. Have you brought me a Divine Intervention scroll?

201430591747022065.NAME: I'm SO glad to see you! I'm a healer, and I had been making my way to Gnisis from Ald'ruhn when these two winged twilights snatched me from the road, bore me into the air, dragged me deep beneath the earth, and stranded me on this high pillar of rock. I prayed to Mara for Divine Intervention. You must have been sent in answer to my prayers.

25488608869716009.NAME: So. Have you brought me a Divine Intervention scroll?

2030312704115164493.NAME: Yes, this is Julielle Aumine's amulet, as her husband described it to me. I shall return it to him. May the Nine bless you for your deeds. Return to Kaye, and tell him that now I am sure I can lay the ghost of Julielle Aumine to rest.

31004203303166454.NAME: When you have killed the four smugglers who murdered Julielle Aumine, and found her stolen amulet, bring me the amulet, and I shall see that her spirit is laid to rest.

25667114721468512458.NAME: Thank you for coming. I have been visited by the spirit of Julielle Aumine. She says she chanced upon a band of smugglers, and was murdered to seal her lips. When I have Julielle's amulet and you have the lives of her murderers, I shall see that her spirit is laid to rest.

558532791050612830.NAME: Thank you again for ridding me of that ghost. I really appreciate it.

2092699671389315141.NAME: Bless the Nine! And you! Thank you for ridding me of that ghost. Since it's not a haunted house any more, now maybe I can get some sleep. And don't worry about the trap door. I'll just leave it alone. Completely alone. My thanks to you. And to the Imperial cult.

24520188271588617343.NAME: Please, let me know when the ghost's gone. I haven't had a good night's sleep in weeks.

128822799162571945.NAME: Thank you, %PCName. I owe you my life. As you can see, I have nothing to give you. But go speak to my father, Hassour Zainsubani, at the Ald Skar Inn in Ald'ruhn, for courage and generosity must always be rewarded. Tell him that I am well, and will come to him as soon as I can. I have no token you might show him, but tell him that I blossom 'anew beneath tomorrow's sun' -- he will know who has sent you.

15820283135467982.NAME: My name is Hannat Zainsubani. I entered this cavern seeking shelter from the weather, and these madmen stripped me and imprisoned me here. I cannot offer you reward. But my father, Hassour Zainsubani, in Ald'ruhn, will gift you generously if you can rescue me.
